txt.en: Defeated the spirit of the watching stone
You have successfully defeated the treacherous watching stone and prevented the spirit from gaining more power.

The breeze coming from the carven statue begins to intensify as dust blows into your face. The gratitude you felt from the watching stone has turned to spite. The stone's eyes begin to glow and you think you see the stone begin to move slightly.\n\nThe watching stone has tricked you in order to serve its own, dark purpose. The stone must be stopped!
A watching stone has sought your assistance in purging evil from the Ered Lithui, but it has tricked you.
The watching stone is in Ered Lithui.\n\nYou should defeat the spirit of the watching stone.
Defeated the spirit of the watching stone.
Defeat the spirit of the watching stone
